loans.name: Santos Agustín

texts.es:
Santos de 57 años de edad es casado, tienen una hermosa a familia de 8 hijos de las edades de entre 7 y 22 años de edad, vive en una comunidad de Sololá.
Santos es un hombre trabajador y disciplinado que trabaja con todas sus fuerzas día con día para que a su familia no le falte nada, a pesar de que en el lugar donde él vive no se cuenta con mucho trabajo, el para generar sus ingresos se dedica a dos actividades, el desde hace 3 años tiene una tienda  de compra y venta de abarrotes en un pequeño pueblo  de su comunidad, pero él también es jornalero trabaja con sus vecinos y amigos haciendo todo tipo de trabajo él cuenta que esta segunda actividad es bastante rentable, pero Santos ahora tiene la iniciativa de hacer de su pequeño negocio algo más grande pero una de las limitaciones de  Santos es que no cuenta con suficiente capital para incrementar la mercadería de la tienda,  por tal motivo el solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de refrescos, recitos, y entre otros.
El sueño de Santos es poder contar con este crédito para hacer la inversión en su tienda y con las ganancias que genere poder comprar un terreno.
texts.en:
Santos, 57, is married.  He has a beautiful family with eight children between the ages of 7 and 22.  He lives in a community in Sololá.

Santos is a hardworking and disciplined man who works with all his might every day so his family will have everything they need.  There's not a lot of work in the area where he lives, but he works two jobs to earn an income.  He has had a grocery store for three years in a small town in his community.  He's also a day laborer: He works with his neighbors and friends, doing all kinds of jobs.  He said this second job is very profitable.

Now Santos has taken the initiative to expand his small business.  One of his limitations, however, is that he doesn't have enough capital to expand the merchandise in his store.  For that reason he's requesting a loan to buy soft drinks, bags of snacks, and other products.

Santos's dream is to be able to have this loan so he can invest in his store and buy a plot of land with his profits.

loans.use: to buy bags of snacks and soft drinks

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer de 37 años de edad, vive en una comunidad de Suchitepéquez es casada pero no  tiene hijos.
Ana trabajadora y perseverante es una señora que para generar sus ingresos y apoyar a su esposo que en este momento se encuentra en los estados unidos se dedica a la venta de aguas y comidas en la plaza de su comunidad, esta actividad ella lo realiza desde hace 4 años, Ana cuenta que esta actividad lo aprendió de su madre, Ana a pesar de que no tiene hijos para ella no es ningún impedimento para seguir soñando en grande,  ell desde hace algunos años ha tenido el anhelo de tener un local donde pueda vender sus comidas y darle a su clientela un mejor servicio,y ahora tiene la oportunidad de poder hacer su sueños realidad porque   hace algunos días le ofrecieron un terreno de ½ cuerda a un buen precio y cerca de la plaza de su comunidad, pero una de las limitaciones que Ana tiene es de que ella no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para poder comprar el terreno, ahora Ana junto a su esposo han  decidido realizar un préstamo de Q.10,000.00 para  que puedan comprar el terreno y puedan algún día construir el local de Ana.
El deseo de Ana es poder contar con este préstamo para hacer su sueño realidad y que su esposo pueda regresar de los estados unidos.
texts.en:
Ana is a 37-year-old woman. She lives in a community in Suchitepéquez; she is married, but does not have children.

Ana is hardworking and persevering. She is a woman who earns her living selling water and food in the plaza of her community in order to generate income and help her husband, who is currently in the United States. She has run this business for four years. Ana explains that she learned this business from her mother. 

For Ana, having no children is no impediment to dreaming big; for several years, she has had the desire to have a shop where she could sell her meals and give her customers better service. Now she has the opportunity to be able to make her dreams reality: a few days ago a 1/2 cuerda [a Guatemalan unit of measure] lot was offered for sale at a good price close to her community's plaza, but one of Ana's limitations is that she does not have enough money to be able to buy the lot. Now, Ana and her husband have decided to take out a loan of 10,000.00 Guatemalan Quetzals [GTQ] so that she can buy the lot and someday build Ana's shop. 

Ana's wish is to be able to have this loan in order to make her dreams reality and for her husband to be able to return from the United States.

loans.use: to buy a lot

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is a hardworking single man who likes his business of crop production in Hoima, Uganda. He is aged 39 and over the years he has always hoped of growing his business but price fluctuations and weather changes are his main challenges. John will use the loan facility to start up a new cassava plantation.

loans.use: to start up a new cassava plantation.

loans.name: Jamila

texts.en:
Jamila lives in Hoima, Uganda. She is a hardworking single mother of three children ranging in age from seven to fifteen years old. She deals in secondhand clothes, which is the main source of her income to support her family. 

She wants to grow her business and reach out to her esteemed customers despite the difficulty of seasonal changes, especially during the rainy season. During the rainy season she doesn't work, since she operates from an open place. This reduces her profits. Jamila is seeking credit to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is a 55-year-old married woman and a mother of seven adult children from San Dionisio, Iloilo. She runs a small sari-sari or retail store business selling various goods and items to the people in her store. Rosalinda has been in this business for more than ten years now. 

Rosalinda is asking to take a loan to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, cooking oil and condiments, bread, and biscuits. A loan will help her improve her stock, thus attracting more buyers to her store. In the future Rosalinda hopes to make her business a success.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, cooking oil and condiments, bread, and biscuits.

loans.name: Shaiyrbubu

texts.ru: Шайырбубу, 54 года, вдова, мать 5 детей. У Шайырбубу среднее образование, уже много лет она занимается сельским хозяйством. Сегодня в хозяйстве Шайырбубу есть 3 коровы, 30 овец, также на собственном земельном наделе мерою 2,5 Га она занимается полеводством, выращивая фасоль. Экологически чистая и вкуснейшая продукция пользуется большим спросом и приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме около 20,000 сомов(KGS), этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь Шайырбубу и ее детей, младшей дочери 11 лет. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Шайырбубу обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 10 овец, чтобы увеличить ее доходы от бизнеса. В будущем Шайырбубу планирует направлять доходы от кредита на развитие ее сельскохозяйственной деятельности.
texts.en: Shaiyrbubu is 54 years old, a widow, and the mother of five children.  She has a secondary education and she has been involved in agriculture for many years.  She currently owns three cows and 30 sheep and she also grows beans on 2.5 hectares of her own land.  Her delicious organic farm products are in high demand and bring her a monthly income of about 20,000 som (KGS).  However, this income is not sufficient for Shaiyrbubu and her children to have a decent life.  Her youngest daughter is only 11 years old.  In order to further grow her business, Shaiyrbubu has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS).  She will use her loan to increase the income she makes from her business.  In the future, she is planning to use the earnings from her loan to expand her farming activity.

loans.use: to purchase 10 sheep for fattening and resale, which will allow her to increase her income.

loans.name: Trufena's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Trufena, often described as an extremely reliable person. She is 50 years old and, as a group leader, she is representing her group of 10 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. She is married and has two children.

Trufena is returning this season to work with One Acre Fund again as this means that she is able to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods, which is why she decided to join in the first place. Trufena says that she is happy to have made that decision because since she first joined in 2014, she has had more profits from each harvest, which has improved her day-to-day life significantly. Trufena will use the profits from this season to send her children to school.

The group will use this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer to plant a total of 3.5 acres. Given that some members of the group will also be purchasing a solar light, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of six solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 21-year-old single man who opened his own electricity and satellite connections business three years ago. He is a hard worker and an ambitious young man who has a good reputation in his region. Today, he is acquiring a youth loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to develop his business by buying the necessary toolkit to facilitate his work and provide his customers with better service.

Mohamad hopes to expand his business in the future to increase his income and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy the necessary toolkit which will facilitate his work.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 20 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la venta de pan dulce, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, la joven vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda repellando las paredes, cambiando las puertas y encementando el piso, pero con lo que obtiene de sus ventas no le alcanza para realizarlo por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de cemento, arena, puertas y pago de mano de obra para que ella y su esposo puedan vivir mas cómodos y seguros.
texts.en: The young woman who has a blurred face is 20 years old and lives in a high risk area. She works selling pastries. With what she obtains from her sales she is able to cover some of the expenses of her household. The young woman lives in her own home with her husband. She wants to improve her home by plastering the walls, changing the doors and cementing the floor. However, what she makes from her sales is not enough to complete it. For this reason she is seeking a loan to purchase cement, sand, doors and to pay for manual labor so that she and her husband can live more comfortably and secure.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, doors and to pay for manual labor.

loans.name: Firas Group

texts.en:
Lamiaa is the featured borrower of Firas group. She got along with the other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua because they have always been neighbors and friends, and they work hard to develop their families' living.

Lamiaa runs her business from her house with fifteen years of experience in this domain. She is a 39-year-old married mother of one child. She is the lady at the far left side of the picture. Through her acquired loan she will buy special beauty salon tools and furniture to develop her business and attract more customers. She will also buy a tattoo machine and necessary cosmetics, in a step forward towards moving her business to an external shop to attract more customers and increase her income.

As for the other group members, Bariaa is the lady at the center (a widowed mother of two) who sells women's cloaks for a living. Her requested loan will be invested in buying necessary home appliances she needs. For Malakeh, the lady at the far right side of the picture, her requested loan will be invested in traveling to holy religious places.

loans.use: to buy special beauty salon tools and furniture to develop her business and attract more customers to move her business outside her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy footwear and television accessories.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is 25 years old. She is not married and has no children. She has had a hotel business for four years. She also has a motorcycle transport business and it has been profitable.

She will be using the loan to purchase another motorcycle and hopes this will help her to serve more customers and increase her income. She will also use the anticipated profits to improve her living standards.

Her hopes and dreams for the future are to expand her hotel business and be successful.

loans.use: to buy another motorcycle and serve more customers and increase her income.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en: Catherine lives in Masindi, Uganda. She runs a bar that sells beer and soda to the general public. She has a dream of educating her three children though inadequate capital is still a challenge. Catherine built houses to rent so as to add to her income generation. She is in need of a credit facility to buy beer and soda to sell.

loans.use: to buy beer and soda to sell.

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en:
Wilson is a 58-year-old married man living in Masindi, Uganda and is responsible for taking care of eight children, three of whom attend school. He runs a retail shop that sells sugar, soap and cooking oil. His major clients are the general public. He has a dream of educating all his children. Competition is still a challenge to his business.

He wants a loan to buy salt, soap, and cooking oil to sell.

loans.use: to buy salt, soap, and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Carolyne's Group

texts.en:
Carolyne, pictured above, has been a farmer for one year, and is now proud to represent her group of 11 farmers in Kakamega North District. She is 32 years old, is married and has five children.

Carolyne likes to think of herself as a very hardworking individual. She has been working alongside One Acre Fund since 2013 and decided to represent her group because she wanted to be more active in her community. She says that being part of the One Acre Fund community has meant that she has been able to consistently feed her family. Carolyne plans to use the profits from this coming season to save more money for the future.

In total, Carolyne’s Group will receive inputs to cultivate 5.25 acres of land. Given that some members of the group will also be purchasing a solar light, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of 10 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Claudine

texts.en: Claudine is 37 years old. She is married with five children aged between 8 months and 9 years. Three of her children go to school. She is a farmer and she has been producing rice for 18 years. Her husband is a businessman. With this loan from Kiva, she would like to pay workers. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children and to buy a piece of land.

loans.use: To pay workers.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es casada tiene 34 años vive junto a su esposo con la que engendro 3 hijos delas edades entre 4 y 14 años de edad de los cuales dos estudian en la escuela de su comunidad, y una está bajo el cuidado de la mama.
Maria es una madre de familia muy trabajadora y luchadora, ella para generar sus ingresos y apoyar a su esposo para el mantenimiento de su hogar se dedica a dos actividades, para ella a pesar de ser mujer no es ningún impedimento trabajar en el campo y cultivar, es por eso que ella se dedica al cultivo de banano, café, y Maxan, esta labor para Maria no es suficiente porque también elabora tejidos y bordados típicos de su región, según cuenta Maria que esta segunda actividad para ella es bastante rentable, es una mujer muy fuerte que no se cansa ante nada, ella junto a su esposo se han dedicado a darle a su familia lo necesario, pero en este momento lo que ella quiere es aumentar su cultivo, pero para poder hacerlo necesita de más terreno, en estos días se les dio la oferta de una venta de terreno que se encuentra al lado de su terreno pero una de las dificultades de Maria es que ella no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para poder realizar esta compra entonces ella junto su esposo han decidido realizar un prestamo para poder comprar su terreno y aumentar su cultivo.
El único anhelo de Maria es pode contar su con este prestamo para realizar la inversión en la compra de su terreno.
texts.en:
Maria is married. She is 34 years old. She lives with her husband, with whom she has three children whose ages are between 4 and 14. Two of them go to the school in the community, and one is still in the mother's care.

Maria is a very hard-working and striving mother of a family. To generate her income and support her husband in maintaining their household, she works in two businesses. In spite of being a woman, this is no impediment for her to work in the field and raise crops. It is for this reason that she raises bananas, coffee, and maxan [leaves used in Guatemala for wrapping tamales]. For Maria, this work is not sufficient, because she also does weavings and embroidery that are traditional in her region. According to what Maria says, this second activity is quite profitable for her. She is a very strong woman who doesn't rest in the face of anything. 

Together with her husband, they have worked to give their family the necessities, but at this time what she wants is to increase her plantings, but to be able to do it, she needs more land. At the present time, some land that is alongside her land is being offered for sale, but one of Maria's difficulties is that she doesn't have sufficient money to be able to make this purchase. Thus she and her husband have decided to take out a loan to be able to buy her land and increase her crops.

Maria's only desire is to be able to have this loan to make the investment in the purchase of her land.

loans.use: to buy land

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: Don Julio es un hombre laborioso que a sus 68 años se dedica a la comercialización de calzado en algunos departamentos del país y también elabora calzado, es el décimo quinto ciclo que ADIM le brinda el financiamiento para su negocio y ha demostrado ser responsable y trabajador, este crédito lo solicita para la compra de zapatos para varón, sandalias para niñas, zapatos para niñas, y también invertir en mochilas, con los créditos anteriores ha logrado abrir nuevos mercados lo que le ha permitido mejorar sus ingresos y por ende lo motiva a seguir solicitando los financiamientos en esta institución financiera.
texts.en: Julio is a hard-working man who at 68 years old works selling shoes in some of the departments of the country and he also makes shoes. This is the 15th time that ADIM has given him loans for his business and he has shown himself to be responsible and hard-working. This loan he is requesting is to buy men's shoes, children's sandals, shoes for children and also to invest in back-packs. With his previous loans he has managed to open new markets which has allowed him to improve his income and in the end motivates him to continue to request loans from this financial institution.

loans.use: to buy shoes and sandals to continue to open new markets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more chickens.

loans.name: Maria Zenaida

texts.es:
Maria se dedica a la actividad de la confección desde hace aproximadamente 15 años, gracias a esto ha podido contribuir, junto con su esposo al sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. 

Maria es madre de 2 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer todo lo necesario, debido a que los ingresos que generaba su esposo no eran suficientes para poder sostener su hogar, Maria decidió montar un taller donde ofrece el servicio de confección a terceros.  

Gracias a la buena calidad de las prendas que fabrica (jeans), ha podido captar una muy buena clientela, lo que le ha permitido tener muy buenas ventas. 
Trabaja todos los días durante 8 horas con un familiar empleado.

Maria actualmente quiere aumentar la capacidad de producción de su taller con el ánimo de poder pagar los estudios universitarios de sus hijos, es por esto que aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de insumos como tela, hilos y agujas.

Maria espera que de esta manera pueda cumplir su sueño de que sus hijos accedan a una educación universitaria, además, de poder mejorarle la calidad de vida a su familia. 

Maria espera que su taller aumente las ventas considerablemente y en un futuro hacerlo crecer y poder generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas. 

Ayuda con un préstamo el taller de Maria!
texts.en:
Maria has worked as a seamstress for approximately 15 years. Thanks to this work she has been able to contribute, together with her husband, to the payment of the expenses of her home. Maria is the mother of two children who she has always wanted to offer whatever it is that they need. Because the income her husband earned was not enough to sustain her home, Maria decided to start a business where she would offer third party seamstress services.

Thanks to the high quality of the garments that she manufactures (jeans) she has been able to attract a very good clientele which has allowed her to complete many good sales. She works everyday for 8 hours with a family employee. Currently, Maria wants to increase the production capacity of her business with the goal of being able to pay for the university studies of her children. It is because of this that she hopes that a loan will give her the opportunity to complete the purchase of supplies such as fabric, thread and needles. 

Maria hopes that this way she will be able to accomplish her dream that her children complete a university education and, moreover, that she will be able to improve the quality of life of her family. Maria hopes that her business will increase its sales considerably and in the future she wants to make it grow and to generate employment for those who need it most. 

Help Maria's business with a loan!

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as fabric, thread and needles.

loans.name: María Doralba

texts.es:
María es una interactiva e inquieta mujer, muy trabajadora, creativa y que sabe aprovechar muy bien sus espacios, a sus 58 años de edad se dedica a la venta de mercancía básicamente ropa para mujer, paralelo a esto también tiene su salón de belleza en el mismo local.
Ella es separada de su esposo y con él tuvo dos hijas.
María solicita un préstamo para incentivar e impulsar su venta de mercancía, con dicho préstamo comprara bolsos y accesorios como correas, sandalias, sombreros, complementando su almacén y haciendo ver como un verdadero paraíso para las mujeres.
texts.en:
María is an interactive and lively woman. She is very hardworking and creative and knows to make the most of her premises. At 58 years old, she sells merchandise, mainly women's clothing. She also has a beauty salon on the same premises. María is separated from her husband with whom she had 2 daughters.

María is requesting a loan to stimulate and boost her business selling merchandise. With this loan she will buy purses and accessories such as belts, sandals, hats, supplementing her shop and making it look like a true paradise for women.

loans.use: to buy purses and accessories such as belts, sandals, hats, to supplement her shop.

loans.name: Miguel Enrique

texts.es:
La agricultura es una actividad que tiene en las venas el señor Miguel quien a sus 59 años de edad honra la actividad que han desempeñado sus antecesores, en su negocio brinda trabajo a tres personas y entre los otros trabajan una extensa jornada de 10 horas todo sea por el progreso y la mejora de su calidad de vida.
Miguel quiere solicitar un apoyo para la compra de insumos agrícolas, de abonos, riegos, semillas y algunos pesticidas.
Con este apoyo podrá preparar la tierra para un nuevo cultivo y mantener el que aun esta en maduración.
texts.en:
Agriculture is an activity that Señor Miguel has in his veins. At his age of 59, he honors the work that his ancestors did. In his business, he offers work to three people, and with the others he works a long work day of 10 hours, all for progress and the improvement of his quality of life.

Miguel wants to apply for support for the purchase of agricultural supplies, compost, irrigation, seeds, and some pesticides.

With this support, he will be able to prepare the land for a new crop and maintain what is still maturing.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies, compost, irrigation, seeds, and some pesticides

loans.name: Lamara

texts.en:
Lamara, 58, is a single woman from Chaladidi village. She lives alone and has no source of significant income. She is engaged in agribusiness, her only source of income. Her salary is not enough to meet her basic needs.

Lamara has pigs and cultivates a small-scale piece of land, where she harvests nuts. She sells her agricultural products at the local market. Over time, as it becomes harder to earn a living, Lamara wants to expand her trading business to more effectively meet her daily costs. 

A loan of 500 Georgian laris will be a great support to this hardworking woman. She will use the loan to purchase stock of primary food products, which she will start selling from a small cabin in her village. This will enable Lamara to generate income daily, which will help her to improve her living conditions and create a better lifestyle. 

Lamara awaits your support and kindness and will be very grateful for the help.

loans.use: To start trading in food products

loans.name: Grupo Mujeres De Chuicomo Group

texts.es:
Dominga es una señora de 39 años de edad es casada, cuenta con una linda familia de 5 hijos de las edades  entre 11 y 21 años de edad, vive en una comunidad de Nahuala.
Dominga  (la primera del lado izquierdo de la fotografía de blusa morado)  es una madre dedicada a la familia porque para generar sus ingresos ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de ropa típica, esta labor lo realiza ella desde hace 30 años, a ella le gusta esta actividad porque a través de ella se relaciona con mucha gente de su comunidad, Dominga ahora quiere mejorar la calidad y estilo de su trabajo pero para hacerlo se necesita de una variedad de materiales pero lamentablemente Dominga no cuenta con suficiente capital para poder realizar este cambio, entonces Dominga con el afán de realizar su objetivo, ha organizado a un grupo de señoras con el mismo objetivo, para solicitar un préstamo con la que compra materia prime como: hilo de tipo alemán seda y lustrina manchada, para hacer que el tejido tenga más atracción al público.
El gran sueño de Dominga es poder realizar esta inversión para mejorar sus ingresos y poder empezar a construir una casa de block.
texts.en:
Dominga is 39 years old and married. She has a beautiful family including five children, who are from 11 to 21 years old. She lives in the Nahuala community.

Dominga (the first from the left side of the photograph, wearing a purple blouse) is a dedicated mother who makes and sells traditional clothing for a living. She has been working at this job for 30 years. She likes this activity because it allows her to interact with many people in the community.

Now Dominga wants to improve the style and quality of her work but needs a variety of materials to do so. Unfortunately, Dominga doesn't have sufficient funds to make this change. In an effort to realize this objective, Dominga organized a group of women with the same goal. They are asking for a loan to buy raw materials such as German threads, silk, and dyed alpaca textiles to make the fabric more appealing to the public.

Dominga's dream is to make this investment in order to improve her income and to be able to start building a house of cement blocks.

loans.use: buy German thread, silk, and alpaca textiles.

loans.name: Maryori

texts.es:
Ella es Maryori una mujer de grandes actitudes, recursiva, humilde pero agradecida, ella con los pocos ahorros que tenía logro montar una papelería y gracias a ella puede apoyar a su esposo, para mantener su hogar constituido por 3 hijos dos de ellos menores de edad y uno de ellos adolecente. 
Su propósito con el que inicio el negocio fue poder pagar la educación de sus hijos y así su esposo se encarga del sostenimiento del hogar un trabajo en equipo de una familia humilde pero que busca lo mejor para ellos. 
Con el apoyo de un préstamo ella quiere aumentar su inventario, comprara cuadernos, lapiceros, lápiz, carteras colores, surtido de papelería en general.
texts.en:
This is Maryori, a woman with grand aspirations who is procedural, humble and grateful. Through the small amount of savings she had, she was able to launch a bookstore, and thanks to this business she is able to help out her husband with maintaining their family. They have three children, two of whom are young and one of whom is an adolescent.

The reason Maryori launched a business was in order to be able to pay for her children's education; and her husband is in charge of sustaining their home. They work as a team for their humble family, because they want the best for their children. Through the support of a loan, Maryori wants to increase her inventory. She will purchase a variety of items to stock her bookstore, such as notebooks, pencils and mechanical pencils, and book bags in assorted colors.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of supplies for her bookstore.

loans.name: Leidy Bibiana

texts.es:
Leidy es una dama de 29 años de edad, ella trabaja con mucho empeño, bastantes horas, en su negocio de venta de frutas todo por llevar a su hogar un alimento digno y ser el sostenimiento de su familia.
Es Madre de 2 hijos de  6 y 9 años de edad, toda la responsabilidad recae sobre sus hombros pues se separó de su esposo quedando como cabeza de familia. 
Con la ayuda de un préstamo Leidy quiere mejorar sus ventas, incrementar su utilidad, buscando engrandecer su negocio para un día dejarles un buen legado a sus hijos. 
Con el préstamo comprara surtido vario de frutas, moras, fresas, lulos, maracuyá, naranjas, manzanas entre otros.
texts.en:
Leidy is a 29 year old lady.  She works with a great deal of determination, for many hours, in her fruit-selling business, all to bring decent food to her home and be her family’s support.

She is the mother of two children ages 6 and 9.  All the responsibility falls on her shoulders, since she separated from her husband, leaving her as the head of her family.

With the help of a loan, Leidy wants to improve her sales and increase her profit.  She is seeking to expand her business so that one day she can leave a good legacy to her children.

With the loan, she will buy a varied supply of fruits, blackberries, strawberries, lulos, passion fruit, oranges, and apples, among others.

loans.use: to buy a varied supply of fruit, blackberries, strawberries, lulos, passion fruit, oranges, and apples, among others.

loans.name: Maysaa

texts.en: Maysaa is a 26-year-old divorced lady, who has been working as a secretary in a reputable company since 2011. Maysaa proved to be an employee in good, and is working hard to develop her career. Maysaa has to undergo a necessary urgent surgery, but her limited monthly salary isn't enough to cover the unexpected expenses. Thus for this reason, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, pay for a necessary surgery she has to undergo. She hopes that in the future she can open her own insurance company and develop her own career business.

loans.use: To pay for a necessary surgery she has to undergo

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 21-year-old single man who opened an entertainment shop a year ago to cover his needs and expenses. He is an ambitious young man who wants to build an independent successful future, as he has a good reputation among his customers.

Today, Mohammad is acquiring a Youth loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to develop his business through buying necessary computers and play stations, and he wants to buy a "Saj" (domed or convex metal griddle which is used to bake a special type of Markook flatbread).

Mohammad hopes to expand his business more in the future to increase his income and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy computers, play stations, and "Saj"

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 24-year-old single man, who specializes in gardening, which developed from a hobby into a successful business.  He is well known in his region with his special talents and encouraging prices. Ali has six years of experience in this domain, and he is working hard to develop it as much as he can. His name is widespread in his region, and he is highly recommended by his customers who he provided with special decorated gardens with colorful designs. Ali has a college degree in this domain, and he is developing his talents in a good professional way.

Ali is acquiring a Youth loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy special season's flowers and plants wholesale to increase his profit and develop his business properly. He hopes that in the future he can have his own greenhouses and produce his own flowers and plants.

loans.use: To buy special season's flowers and plants wholesale to increase his profit and develop his business properly

loans.name: Ilhama

texts.en:
Ilhama is 43-year-old married woman and has a daughter. The family lives in Baku. Her husband works as a carpenter and her daughter is a seller in a small product shop; they earn little money. Ilhama also is a seller. She sells small construction materials such as nails, hammers, axes, glue, shovels, and sand paper in a local bazaar next to their house. She has worked at this bazaar for 15 years and earns only 155 AZN monthly. For the life in the capital of Azerbaijan, these earnings aren't enough and it's hard for her family to cover their needs. 

Ilhama's daughter is a very smart and hardworking girl, and she studies in order to get a higher education and have a good job. Ilhama loves her daughter and wants to provide her a happy life and a bright future. She applied for a 1500 AZN loan in order to make the payment for her daughter's education.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's education.

loans.name: Anthony

texts.es: Anthony  de 24 años de edad,  soltero y sin hijos, es una agradable estudiante de la facultad de DISEÑO GRAFICO, estudia mucho para alcanzar sus metas en la vida. Anthony  tiene la meta de culminar sus estudios con éxitos y poder ser un buen DISEÑADOR GRAFICO  Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  para el pago de sus pensiones universitarias  y  realizar la compra  de útiles de estudio que necesita. Anthony  se encuentra muy agradecido  por la ayuda brindada y se despide con muchos deseos de culminar sus metas propuestas agradece a  kiva por la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en: Anthony is 24 years old, he is single and does not have any children. He is a nice young man who studies graphic design. He studies a lot in order to achieve his goals. Anthony's goal is to complete his studies successfully, and to become a good graphic designer. With the loan he receives, he will invest in the purchase of the school supplies he needs. Anthony is very grateful for the help provided, and he expresses his wish that he will be able to achieve his goals and is grateful to Kiva for the opportunity provided by this loan.

loans.use: to cover university expenses.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 57-year-old married father of 11 children who has worked as a driver in a company for 41 years to cover the needs and expenses of his family.
Ahmad is a hard worker who is trying desperately to improve his family's living conditions despite the increasing living costs. Today, he is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay his children's school tuition fees. Ahmad hopes to stay capable of satisfying his family's needs.

loans.use: to pay his children's school tuition fees

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel is a 31-year-old married woman and the mother of two children from San Dionisio, Iloilo. She owns a small sari-sari (variety) store selling various goods and foodstuffs to the people in her place. Maricel has been in the business for more than two years now. This is the source of her income.  

Maricel would like to take a loan to buy more stocks of items like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, condiments, bread, and snack foods to sell. A loan will help her improve her stock, thus attracting more buyers to her store. 

Maricel hopes to make her business more sustainable in the future. Moreover, she also wants to save money for the educational expenses of her children.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, condiments, bread, and snack foods to sell.

loans.name: Arlyn

texts.en: Arlyn is resident of San Dionisio, Iloilo. She is married and has one child. Arlyn earns a living through her hog raising business. She has been raising pigs for more than two years now. She also earns an additional income through her sari-sari or retail store business. Arlyn is asking for a loan to buy more piglets to raise, and animal feed, and more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries and others. A loan will help her improve her stock thus attracting more buyers in her store and will also improve her hog raising business. Arlyn's future dreams include the expansion of her ventures to generate more revenue.

loans.use: to buy more piglets to raise, and animal feed, and more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries and others

loans.name: Erma

texts.en: Erma is a 47-year-old married woman and a mother of 10 children. The eldest is 25 and the youngest child is 5 years old. Erma owns a motorcycle which her husband operates to transport passengers from one place to another.  She also earns an additional income through her snack food vending business.  Erma is asking for a loan to buy spare parts for the motorcycle such as wheel tire, nuts and bolts and chains, and additional ingredients for food vending such as flour, sugar, cooking oil and others. A loan will help her improve her business as well as her income.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for the motorcycle such as wheel tire, nuts and bolts and chains, and additional ingredients for food vending such as flour, sugar, cooking oil and others

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy poultry to produce eggs and other by-products.

loans.name: Mildred Del Socorro

texts.es:
Mildred es una mujer muy sencilla, ella goza y agradece que tenga un techo donde dormir, un alimento que disfrutar, y tres maravillosos hijos, ella le toco criarlos solos, logro generar los recursos para mantener su vivienda con su venta de alimentos informal, un negocio que se lo enseño su prima, su horario de trabajo es realmente sorprendente, trabaja los 7 días de la semana con una intensidad de 14 horas, la verdad un gran esfuerzo pero lo vale con tal de que su familia no pase hambre.
Ella sueña poder mejorar su negocio, dar empleo, tener un restaurante, mejorar sus ventas, aumentar sus clientes y ser más eficiente.
Mildred se encuentra solicitando un apoyo crediticio para tener capital de trabajo que invertirá en surtido como frutas y granos para realizar sus alimentos y la compra de maquinaria industrial buscando optimizar sus tiempos de producción.
texts.en:
Mildred is a very simple woman. She enjoys and is grateful to have a roof to sleep under, food to enjoy and 3 marvelous children. She has to raise them by herself. She manages to generate the resources to support her household with the informal sales of food which her cousin taught her. Her hours of work are quite surprising as she works 7 days a week with an norm of 14 hours per day. In truth it is a huge effort but it is worth it so that her family does not go hungry.

She dreams of improving her business, for example to have a restaurant, improve her sales, increase her clients and be more efficient. Mildred finds herself requesting a loan to have working capital that she will invest in a variety of foods like fruit and grains to make her foods and buy industrial machinery looking to optimize her production time.

loans.use: to invest in a variety of fruits and grains to make her foods and buy industrial machinery looking to optimize her production time.

loans.name: Tariel

texts.en: Tariel is a 56-year-old married man. He lives with his wife, son and pensioner mother in Samtredia district. They do not have any significant income and live in poverty. Tariel is unemployed, as there is a high unemployment rate in the region. He decided to start business and requested a loan. The Start Up program. which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo enables him to get a loan of 1,500 GEL. With the received credit he will purchase a minibus line and will work as a driver to serve local people. He will be able to generate income and improve the living conditions of his family. Tariel awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase a minibus line and serve local people as a driver

loans.name: Felipa

texts.es:
Felipa, de 67 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, está acompañada y su pareja se dedica a la agricultura, tiene 3 hijos, pero solo una hija vive con ella.

Felipa, se dedica a la crianza de ganado, ademas tiene una pequeña tienda desde hace aproximadamente 10 años.- Antes se dedicaba a la siembra de granos básicos como maíz y frijol.

El préstamo sera utilizado para comprar una vaca de ordeño y así poderla cargar y aprovechar la leche y la cría.

El sueño que siempre a tenido Felipa, es hacer su casa de bloque, porque donde vive actualmente es de barro.
texts.en:
Felipa, 67, has a 3rd grade education. She is married and her husband works in agriculture. She has 3 children, but only a daughter lives with her.

Felipa makes a living raising livestock. She has also had a small store for about 10 years. Previously, she made a living growing staple grains such as corn and beans.

This loan will be used to buy a milk cow and thus take advantage of the milk and the offspring. The dream that Felipa's always had is to build her house with concrete blocks since her current one is made of clay.

loans.use: to buy a milk cow.

loans.name: Elene

texts.en:
Elene is a 52-year-old married woman from the small village of Samtredia district. Elene lives with her husband, two children, and pensioner mother-in-law. The family is involved in agricultural activities. In particular, they have a cow, a calf, and a pig. They also cultivate the family-owned agricultural land and grow different kinds of vegetables there.

Elene decided to start an additional business and requested a loan. The start up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan of 5100 GEL. With the received credit she will purchase a tractor and will rent it out for cultivating agricultural land. This will be a profitable business because there is a high demand. 

Elene awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase a tractor and rent it out for cultivating agricultural land.

loans.name: Wyclife's Group

texts.en:
Wyclife, pictured above, has been a farmer for 5 years and is now proud to represent his group of 11 farmers in Kakamega North District. He is 42 years old, married, and has 5 children.

Wyclife likes to think of himself as a very experienced farmer. He has been working alongside One Acre Fund since 2014 and decided to represent his group because he wanted to gain leadership skills. He says that being part of the One Acre Fund community has meant that he has had more profits from each harvest. Wyclife plans to use the profits from this coming season to invest in a business.

In total, Wyclife’s Group will receive inputs to cultivate 3.75 acres of land. Given that some members of the group will also be purchasing a solar light, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of 10 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve his maize harvests.

loans.name: Henry's Group

texts.en:
Henry is a 68-year-old proud father of 6 children. He is a group leader, often described as a very reliable person, and is representing his group of 10 farmers in Kakamega North District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2013, Henry has noticed that he has had more profits from each harvest.

Henry described his harvest as excellent last year, but believes he can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. He is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because he will now be able to have light during dark hours for his children to be able to study. With the profits from this season’s harvest, he plans to repair his home.

With this loan, Henry’s Group will be able to plant a total of 3.75 acres of land and purchase a total of 7 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Abdala's Group

texts.en:
Abdala is 25 years old and is often described as a very reliable person. He has one child and is married. As a group leader, Abdala is representing his group of 10 farmers in Kakamega North District in Kenya, and is very excited to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

The decision to join One Acre Fund was largely a result of Abdala's desire to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Apart from receiving farming inputs, he is also purchasing a solar light as part of his loan, which is very exciting to him as he will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits that he gains from this year’s harvest, he plans to save more money for the future.

Abdala and his group will receive a total of 9 solar lights as well as input loans of maize and fertilizer to plant a total of 3.25 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Amrah

texts.en:
Amrah is a 22-year-old student. He lives with his parents in Baku, the capital of Azerbaijan and studies at Azerbaijan West University in the field of economics. He is very hardworking and smart. He does everything in order to get a higher education, get his master's degree and get a good job connected with economics.

Amrah is very interested in economics. He reads a lot and always collects information about the economic situation in Azerbaijan and different countries. He thinks that being a professional in economics is very important. He applied for a 1,200 AZN loan in order to make the quarterly payment for his education and be able to continue his education. He plans to be a highly-qualified specialist and businessman and provide his family with a good life and future.

loans.use: to make the quaterly payment for his education and be able to continue his education

loans.name: Hala

texts.en:
Hala is a 49-year-old widowed woman, who has been running her convenience store for 17 years to make her living, since her beloved husband passed away.

Hala is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase her business merchandise with spring/summer special offer products necessary for her business development.

This is Hala's fifth cycle as an Al Majmoua borrower with a good standing paying back history. Her previous loans were invested in developing her business and she acquired this loan for the same reason, and came back with a positive impressive impact on her living.

She hopes that in the future she can diversify her products widely and attract more of her customers' attention.

loans.use: To increase her business merchandise with spring/summer special offer products.

loans.name: Carlos Antonio

texts.es: Carlos tiene 43 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su hija de 20 años de edad. Carlos es un hombre trabajador quien se dedica a la prestación de servicios de seguridad desde hace 8 años, de esta forma  se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Carlos desea terminar de construir un cuarto dormitorio para lo que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, ladrillo, hierro, etc dado que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios para hacerlo por su cuenta pero si tiene la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Carlos is 43 years old and lives in his own house with his 20-year-old daughter. Carlos is a hardworking man who has been providing security services for 8 years. This is how he makes a living and provides for his household. Carlos desires to finish building a bedroom. That is why he made the decision to request this loan from Fusai to buy cement, sand, bricks, iron, etc., since he doesn't have sufficient financial resources to do it on his own, but he has the ability to repay the loan.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks, iron, etc., to finish building a bedroom.
